General.Name: Minerva Intelligence Inc
General.Description: Aisix Solutions Inc., an artificial intelligence (AI) software company, provides climate risk and data-analytics solutions. It focuses on building decision support tools for climate risk applications. The company's flagship product is climate85, a data and analytics platform that provides access to physical climate risk information, as well as forecasting for heat, humidex, precipitation, and wind in various locations for banks and financial institutions, REITs, insurers and underwriters, physical infrastructure owners, engineers, scientists, and governments. It also offers proprietary AI software and related consulting services; and software licensing services. The company was formerly known as Minerva Intelligence Inc. and changed its name to Aisix Solutions Inc. in August 2023. Aisix Solutions Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 850 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1E1
